title: BRIEF-Servicemaster Delivers Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.44
text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:36 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Servicemaster Delivers Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.44 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 1 (Reuters) - Servicemaster Global Holdings Inc :
* SERVICEMASTER DELIVERS SOLID FIRST-QUARTER 2018 RESULTS WITH STRONG GROWTH AT AHS AND FSG, AND CONTINUED TRANSFORMATION AT TERMINIX * Q1 REVENUE $675 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $663 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.40 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* INCREASING FY 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE BY $5 MILLION TO BETWEEN $695 MILLION AND $710 MILLION
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $3.05 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
